pages.text: Animals drop $(item)Carcasses$() when they expire.$(p)$(info) $(item)Carcasses$() can be processed into $(thing)Pelts$() and $(thing)Meats$() with a $(item)Hunter's Knife$() or $(item)Butcher's Knife$().$(p)$(info) Processing a $(item)Carcass$() on a $(item)Butcher's Block$() is likely to produce a higher yield.
